section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: This membership agreement ('Agreement') is made between LastikBende ('Platform') and members ('Member') who wish to use the LastikBende platform. This Agreement governs all rights and obligations related to the use of the Platform.

section2.title: 2. Membership Conditions
section2.content:
2.1. Member must be over 18 years old to use the Platform.
2.2. Member must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.
2.3. Member must comply with all legal regulations while using the Platform.
